name: Warcraft Logs Uploader
description: This is not my work! A big thanks to 怠惰な人 for creating the installer

game.exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/users/$USER/Local Settings/Application Data/Programs/Warcraft Logs Uploader/Warcraft Logs Uploader.exe

content:
files:
- log_upload_installer: https://ddosa82diq6o3.cloudfront.net/WarcraftLogsUploader.exe
game:
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/users/$USER/Local Settings/Application Data/Programs/Warcraft
    Logs Uploader/Warcraft Logs Uploader.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Installing Warcraft Logs Uploader
    executable: log_upload_installer
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  terminal: true
